languages.text: "Говорят, в теневых кварталах не все видит — он к нам спиной стоит. Кха! Ну вот, теперь и это богохульство замаливать. Доведет меня мой язык..."
"They say He might miss a few things in the Shadow Quarters — He's got his back to us here. Hah! Ack, now I'll have to atone for this blasphemy too. Me and my big mouth..."
languages.original_text: "Говорят, в теневых кварталах не все видит — он к нам спиной стоит. Кха! Ну вот, теперь и это богохульство замаливать. Доведет меня мой язык..."

"They say He might miss a few things in the Shadow Quarters — He's got his back to us here. Hah! Ack, now I'll have to atone for this blasphemy too. Me and my big mouth..."
"They say He might miss a few things in the Shadow Quarters — He's got his back to us here. Hah! Ack, now I'll have to atone for this blasphemy too. Me and my big mouth..."

"They say He might miss a few things in the Shadow Quarters — He's got his back to us here. Hah! Ack, now I'll have to atone for this blasphemy too. Me and my big mouth..."

languages.text: “他们说，祂可能是看漏了阴影区的某些东西，说祂根本是在背对着我们。哈！啧，现在轮到我为我的亵渎行为赎罪了，瞧瞧我这个大嘴巴啊……”
languages.original_text: "They say He might miss a few things in the Shadow Quarters — He's got his back to us here. Hah! Ack, now I'll have to atone for this blasphemy too. Me and my big mouth..."

traits.locale_text: “他们说，祂可能是看漏了阴影区的某些东西，说祂根本是在背对着我们。哈！啧，现在轮到我为我的亵渎行为赎罪了，瞧瞧我这个大嘴巴啊……”

languages.text: «Dicen que algunas cosas de los barrios bajos se le pasan por alto... A nosotros nos ha dado la espalda, ¡ja! Ah, ahora también tendré que hacer penitencia por esta blasfemia. Menuda bocaza que tengo...».
languages.original_text: "They say He might miss a few things in the Shadow Quarters — He's got his back to us here. Hah! Ack, now I'll have to atone for this blasphemy too. Me and my big mouth..."

traits.locale_text: «Dicen que algunas cosas de los barrios bajos se le pasan por alto... A nosotros nos ha dado la espalda, ¡ja! Ah, ahora también tendré que hacer penitencia por esta blasfemia. Menuda bocaza que tengo...».

languages.text: 「皇帝はシャドウクォーターの出来事を見逃したって話だけどね…ここでは皇帝も背を向けるのさ。はっ！あぁ、今のは冒涜だ、償わないとね。私ったら、このおしゃべりな口め…」
languages.original_text: "They say He might miss a few things in the Shadow Quarters — He's got his back to us here. Hah! Ack, now I'll have to atone for this blasphemy too. Me and my big mouth..."

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝はシャドウクォーターの出来事を見逃したって話だけどね…ここでは皇帝も背を向けるのさ。はっ！あぁ、今のは冒涜だ、償わないとね。私ったら、このおしゃべりな口め…」
「皇帝はシャドウクォーターの出来事を見逃したって話だけどね…ここでは皇帝も背を向けるのさ。はっ！あぁ、今のは冒涜だ、償わないとね。私ったら、このおしゃべりな口め…」

languages.text: "Angeblich übersieht er in den Schattenquartieren durchaus einiges – er wendet uns hier den Rücken zu. Ha! Mist, jetzt muss ich für diese Blasphemie auch noch Buße tun. Ich und mein großes Mundwerk ..."
languages.original_text: "They say He might miss a few things in the Shadow Quarters — He's got his back to us here. Hah! Ack, now I'll have to atone for this blasphemy too. Me and my big mouth..."

traits.locale_text: "Angeblich übersieht er in den Schattenquartieren durchaus einiges – er wendet uns hier den Rücken zu. Ha! Mist, jetzt muss ich für diese Blasphemie auch noch Buße tun. Ich und mein großes Mundwerk ..."

languages.text: « On dit que certaines choses lui échappent tout de même dans le Quartier des Ombres... parce qu'il lui tourne le dos. Ha ! Mince, je vais devoir expier pour ce blasphème, maintenant. J'ai jamais su me taire... »
languages.original_text: "They say He might miss a few things in the Shadow Quarters — He's got his back to us here. Hah! Ack, now I'll have to atone for this blasphemy too. Me and my big mouth..."

traits.locale_text: « On dit que certaines choses lui échappent tout de même dans le Quartier des Ombres... parce qu'il lui tourne le dos. Ha ! Mince, je vais devoir expier pour ce blasphème, maintenant. J'ai jamais su me taire... »

languages.text: "İmparator, Gölge Mahalli'ndeki bazı şeyleri gözden kaçırıyormuş ama, öyle diyorlar. Bize sırtını dönmüş. Ha ha!.. Tüh, şimdi bu dine aykırılığın da hesabını sorarlar. Şu ağzımı açmasam olmayacak..."
languages.original_text: "They say He might miss a few things in the Shadow Quarters — He's got his back to us here. Hah! Ack, now I'll have to atone for this blasphemy too. Me and my big mouth..."

traits.locale_text: "Gölge Mahali’nde bazı şeyleri kaçırıyormuş ama, öyle diyorlar. Bize sırtını dönmüş. Ha ha! Tu, şimdi bu günahın da hesabını sorarlar. Şu ağzımı açmasam olmayacak..."
